configurableConfig.description: Pick "Custom..." in the popup selection to use a particular browser edition or read from a variable.
configurableConfig.label: Custom

config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
readonly run_script='../../../../com.alfredapp.automation.core/safari/.common/tabs-current-url'

if [[ "${popup_browser}" == 'custom' ]]; then
  browser="${custom_browser}"
else
  browser="${popup_browser}"
fi

"${run_script}" "${browser}" "${1}"
taskDescription: Replaces the URL of Chromium browser's current tab
taskName: Change Current Chromium Browser Tab URL
